remarks: Break a functor into a product category into first and second projections.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Jan-2017.)
statement:
1st2ndprf.t $e |- T = ( D Xc. E ) $.
1st2ndprf.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( C Func T ) ) $.
1st2ndprf.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
1st2ndprf.e $e |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) $.
1st2ndprf $p |- ( ph -> F = ( ( ( D 1stF E ) o.func F ) pairF ( ( D 2ndF E ) o.func F ) ) ) $.
